data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 652,613, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Meherpur, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Meherpur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 654,579 lost in Meherpur that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Meherpur, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Chitrakar (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Chitrakar (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Meherpur who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Meherpur words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Meherpur, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Meherpur
location.people_groups_list: Namassej (Hindu traditions), Mallah Dhawa (Muslim traditions), Pod, Mir, Jogi (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Namassej (Hindu traditions) (4,667,000), Mallah Dhawa (Muslim traditions) (18,000), Pod (2,972,000), Mir (49,000), Jogi (Hindu traditions) (3,173,000)
